landingPage.heroDesc: Every recharge gives you points. Every point is a chance to win big in the MTN MyNumba Don Win promotion.

winningStepCards.title: Step 1
winningStepCards.desc: Opt in to MyNumba Don Win by dialing *123# or clicking 'Join Now

winningStepCards.title: Step 2
winningStepCards.desc: Recharge your MTN line to earn points (₦100 = 1 point, ₦200 = 2 points, Etc

winningStepCards.title: Step 3
winningStepCards.desc: Automatically enter daily and Saturday draws with your points

winningStepCards.title: Step 4
winningStepCards.desc: Win big and receive your prize directly to your account!
